choose-a-man.context: Goliath challenges Israel to single combat
choose-a-man.english: Choose a man for yourselves, and let him come down to me

am-i-a-dog.context: Goliath mocks David coming with a staff
am-i-a-dog.hebrew: הֲכֶלֶב אָנֹכִי כִּי אַתָּה בָא אֵלַי בַּמַּקְלוֹת
am-i-a-dog.english: Am I a dog, that you come to me with sticks?

curse-by-gods.context: Goliath curses David by his gods
curse-by-gods.english: The Philistine cursed David by his gods

give-flesh-to-birds.english: I will give your flesh to the birds of the air

defied-israel.english: I defy the ranks of Israel this day

forty-days.hebrew: וַיִּגַּשׁ הַפְּלִשְׁתִּי הַשְׁכֵּם וְהַעֲרֵב וַיִּתְיַצֵּב אַרְבָּעִים יוֹם
forty-days.english: The Philistine drew near morning and evening for forty days

height-description.english: His height was six cubits and a span
